title: What are the Tamil songs that feed your soul? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pennala pennala from the movie Uzhavan. With the voice of the evergreen S.P. Balasubramanium and mesmerising music of AR Rahman, this song really does stir my soul. It compares the different parts of a girl's body to different flowers. Ok, that sounds a little vulgar but it's really not. The lyrics are truly romantic. If you are in love with a girl, you will totally love this song. If you are not in love with anyone, you will want to fall in love when listening to this song. Every day at work I ensure that I listen to this song while looking at my crush and it is definitely the most gratifying moment of each day.
